channel.title: Adding NPC clipping?
channel.description:
i did a search for NPC clipping and NPC pathing, and got 0 hits for it...so, im going to ask if there is anyone that knows how to make NPC's have clipping like a normal player?
for example: (any server with portals leading to far off coordinates) -you attack an NPC that will follow you indefinitely when attacked -you warp/go through a portal -the NPC will home onto you from anywhere, and will get to you so long as you give it enough time.
the above is what i would like to know if it is possible to correct.
if this is just flat out to much coding for someone to do at my request, is there a way to just limit the distance that an NPC will follow you for?
(ps: if this is in the wrong section please move if possible instead of locking)[br][size=1]Posted on: August 27, 2007, 12:05:01 AM[/size][hr]so i guess there's nothing that can be done about this?

item.title: Adding NPC clipping?
item.dc:creator: @Otsego Otsego
item.description:
@Otsego wrote:

alright then. thats kinda the answer i was expectin to hear. too bad i never followed through on learning java and schools started and i have no more free time now. ah well.

thanks for the response.

Read full topic

item.title: Adding NPC clipping?
item.dc:creator: @Newb_2341 Newb 2341
item.description:
@Newb_2341 wrote:

Not many people know a fix for this (if any), but my suggestion is to mess around with attack within codes and your NPC handler.

item.title: Adding NPC clipping?

item.description:
@Otsego wrote:

i did a search for NPC clipping and NPC pathing, and got 0 hits for it…so, im going to ask if there is anyone that knows how to make NPC’s have clipping like a normal player?

for example: (any server with portals leading to far off coordinates)
-you attack an NPC that will follow you indefinitely when attacked
-you warp/go through a portal
-the NPC will home onto you from anywhere, and will get to you so long as you give it enough time.

the above is what i would like to know if it is possible to correct.

if this is just flat out to much coding for someone to do at my request, is there a way to just limit the distance that an NPC will follow you for?
